Dorothy Townsend

  1. Foster Name: Hazel
  2. Foster Family: Carl and Ellery Becker
  3. Location of Family: Holdrege, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Holdrege, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 10
  7. Date of Birth: Unknown
  8. Gender: female
  9. Married Name: Hazel Hansen
  10. Spouse Name: Chester H. Hansen
  11. Notes: Letter from her attached.
  12. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; 1930 United States Federal Census; 1927 Holdrege Citizen; OTR 110; Eloise Thomsen Corres.; Sharon Becker Corres.
